title: Wandering Minstrel
subTitle: Elf Hero
flavorText: The Lunar Elves, like all Elves, are steeped in a tradition of music that glorifies the Goddess' song. Before the Dragon Call the summits of Dragonback Peaks would echo with their enchanting voices and melody. Now the noble Lunar Elf Poets and singers are little more than wandering minstrals, seeking to scrape out a meager living on the donations of those fortunate enough to hear their song.

abilities.name: Jaunty Tune
abilities.definition: Augment, Aura 2, +1b on all offensive rolls

Wave X.description:

Aura X.description: An Aura effect follows the same rules as Wave X with one important difference -- Auras remain in play, centered on and moving with the user, until the beginning of their next activation.
